author: Chris Brown
title: Swedes' trust in government put to test as coronavirus deaths spike
description: Sweden’s days as an European outlier in the fight against coronavirus may be ending. As deaths rise, many are questioning measures that appear relaxed compared with the rest of the world.
content:
Hakan Savllind 's coffee shop in Stockholm seems like a throwback to the way life used to be before the arrival of COVID-19.
There's a steady stream of customers entering the cafe, standing in a well spaced out line and waiting their turn to order cappuccino… [+5955 chars]
